item.title: Rich Content
item.author: sample@gmail.com (Bino Kochumol Varghese)
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds. Â YouTube Privacy Enhanced Shortcode The youtube shortcode embeds a responsive video player for YouTube videos. Only the ID of the video is required, e.g.: Twitter You want to include a single tweet into your blog post?
